nodes.text: Travels with Gormaanda: Cooking in the Core

Travels with Gormaanda: Cooking in the Core was a book published by the famous intergalactic chef Gormaanda. In the tome, she dispensed such sage advice as when to tip servers. One of the more useful tips it provided was "Don't forget to tip your FA droids while on Coruscant. They are programmed to blacklist the stingy".
